content: *one of our menagerie of amigurumi animals this cheery amphibian is sure to be a super fun critter lion brand yarn * skill level easy 3-5 colors 1 ball each vanna s choice® article #860 or wool-ease® article #620 *small amount of some colors used for details * crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm split ring stitch markers fiberfill stuffing worked in continuous rounds some construction required to finish available in different versions 81010ad 1 november 2008 published in michael s create vanna s choice® article #860 *fern white dusty green black cranberry* 70595ad 2 november 2007 published in knit 1 wool-ease® article #620 *avocado white frost sage* *small amount of black and red yarn* 1 https //www lionbrand com/products/crochet-pattern-amigurumi-frog-3 2 https //www lionbrand com/products/crochet-pattern-amigurumi-frog-2
